title: If Donald Trump Were a Woke Canadian, He’d Be Justin Trudeau
sub_head: ‘Sunny ways’ were once the prime minister’s bywords. Now he’s turned into a divisive demagogue.
body:
Toronto
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met Donald Trump for the first time five years ago this month. The moment became legendary for many Canadians who relished the sight of our young, charismatic leader imposing his cheery manners on the bumptious American president. “Sunny ways” had been one of Mr. Trudeau’s campaign mantras. The whole scene was peak Trudeau.
